name: MathWizard
0:
”Alexa ask Math Wizard to tell me a fact”
”Alexa ask Math Wizard to start a quiz”
”The answer is true”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: math wizard
des: A little bit of learning and lots of fun with this skill is there for you. You can choose to play a simple quiz with basic math questions which can be answered in true or false. Also, there are many interesting facts which you can ask Alexa to share with you by launching this app. This skill definitely helps you learn and have fun at the same time. It's a must try for kids and teens. Go ahead and check this skill out on amazing Alexa!!!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
